thread.title: Grammys 2017: Rihanna Wears Armani Privé on the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Rihanna Wears Armani Privé on the Red Carpet

title: Grammys 2017: Rihanna Wears Armani Privé on the Red Carpet
text: Rihanna Makes a Fashionably Late Entrance at the Grammys February 13, 2017 2:06 AM by Marjon Carlos Photo: Getty Images Flipping the script has always been Rihanna’s calling card. Never afraid to break the rules—whether they be musical or sartorial—the singer knows how to stand out among her pop peers. But perhaps she’s outdone herself tonight on the Grammy Awards red carpet. Arriving after the show had already begun, the Anti star was already coasting a wave all unto herself as she appeared in a jaw-dropping custom Armani Privé crystal-embroidered tangerine top and dramatic deep-black silk organza plissé skirt. A departure from the bubblegum-pink, larger-than-life, quinceañera-chic Giambattista Valli couture gown she floated into the Grammy Awards wearing in 2015, the abs-baring two-piece outfit felt like a bad gal take on the hackneyed formal wear we often expect from awards shows. Sexy and darkly romantic, the look was a daring return to the red carpet for Rihanna who has been decidedly absent for over a year now. But could we have expected anything less from pop and fashion’s biggest rebel? Date Night at the Grammys With Miguel and Nazanin Mandi: In This Story: Rihanna
